nodes.text: "Disapproval" is a narrative written by August Hahn and Cynthia Hahn as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on December 23, 2004 and described an encounter between Darrus Jeht and a drunk Jedi Master at the Crosstown cantina on Cularin. The encounter was related by a member of the Cularin Militia.
In the context of the Living Force campaign, any Jedi Master player-character with five Dark Side points was demoted to Jedi Knight, and any Knight with three Dark Side points was demoted to Padawan.
